name: Submersible Orange Sunset
text: If a "Submersible" monster you control leaves the field because of its own effect: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. (Quick Effect): You can banish this face-up card until the End Phase; add 1 "Submersible" Spell/Trap to your hand, and if you do, you can set 1 "Submersible" Spell/Trap in your GY to your field. You can only activate each effect of "Submersible Orange Sunset" once per Duel.
